COMMON VOX2WORLD:
0.6640625 0.0 0.0 -32.004128
0.0 0.6640625 0.0 -50.16797
0.0 0.0 0.6640625 -49.431232

COMMON 



VOXEL2WORLD:
V=[C R S]'
W = [X Y Z]'
W = M*V

    [DC*STEP DC*STEP DC*STEP DC*START]
M = [DC*STEP DC*STEP DC*STEP DC*START]
    [DC*STEP DC*STEP DC*STEP DC*START]
    [   0       0       0        1   ]

where,
       [C_STEP  0       0     ]
STEP = [0       R_STEP  0     ]
       [0       0       S_STEP]
DC = [x_cos' y_cos' z_cos']
